bibl.title: Afanasij, archiepiskop aleksandrijskij i ego eparkhija. Avec résumé en anglais: Athanasius of Alexandria and His Eparchy.
bibl.note: A survey of Athanasius' life and works (chiefly in connection with his own eparchy) based both on the historical sources and papyrological evidence (archives of Isidoros, Sakaon and Abinnaios, as well as the letters by Christians).
